In order for the app to work properly a handful of permission are needed these permission need to be given to the app by the user. click on the button below and give the required permissions to the app.
Device admin
Password Normal permissions Please wait Delete Send key_pref_user_password Activation password key_pref_authorized_numbers Authorized numbers Separate each number with ," Settings Find Phone you haven\'t set a password Download Delete Encrypt Hide Encrypt selected files Secure Cancel Send Number : Name : Type: Samsung galaxy s7 Add a device Add Pc Phone Give permissions Start server Location File manager Take pictures Factory data reset Files added Password OK Enter password for : Waiting for device to respond Please enter a password Password can\'t be empty Full OnClickType Message was sent,we notify you as soon as we get a response Received new Location Last location No location was detected, maybe you haven\'t set location updates Devices was successfully wiped Wipe failed QhiJEQ.rvzRpQ:j3bg2qww-V8AbOrM Manage Devices Capture with camera

Enable Device admin In order to allow remote wipe or lock this app has to an active admin.click on the OK button,then in the presented screen click on allow admin. Remote wipe has been enabled Remote wipe disabled Internet Sim Card image for the device Tasks key_pref_allow_file_manager Manage files Delete,Upload,Encrypt and hide files remotely \nRequires dropbox to bo installed on your device Silently take pictures using front camera\nRequires dropbox to bo installed on your device Remotly wipe the device A location request has already been sent,Do you want to disable it or change it? Instant location This is only available using internet Failed list Licence isn\'t available key_pref_user_password_encrypted Encrypting database with new password Add second number Do you want to add you\'re second phone number Does\'nt have one This can\'t be empty No Yes Disable silent All set Username Please select an image Syncing your profile image Image successfully synced Failed to sync the image Please connect to the internet and pull down to refresh Successfully updated you\'re info key_pref_user_photo_url Device deleted Failed to delete device,please try again Mark as found Mark as found Device is not in missing mode Retrieving your info Do you want to delete your data from online database too key_pref_device_status key_pref_allow_boot_notification_encrypted has been turned on Received a response for status check request Device booted notification key_pref_is_location_request_sent Reconfigure name or number Add Please grant all permission, the application can\'t continue to work with out them Hello blank fragment Latitude : %d Longitude
Set radius in meteres key_pref_control_zones Activating control zone Radius can\'t be empty or zero Control Zone : %s key_pref_allow_control_zones_encrypted key_pref_allow_control_zones Set a virtual fence around a geographic area which will alerts all devices with this permission when you enter or exit that area Control zones Task : Time : Clear all Delete all alerts Delete alert Delete handler that send this request Manage handler Give handler access key_pref_user_id Saving you\'re info Can this device send sms messages ? We detected a sim card,can this device use this sim card to send text messages No sim card was found if you temporary removed the sim card please insert it since you won\'t be able to use it if you procced. This device does\'nt support a sim card key_pref_is_internet_only Free licence key_pref_is_licence_free Not available with free licence Enter you\'re licence key Activating licence Licence is not valid Your licence is still free,please refer to our website to upgrade your licence Licence upgraded Enter the above code in the add handler with no sim card in the drawer layout of the phone you\'re trying to add to your assets Add Handler with no sim card User id : User was not found,remember user needs to be using the same licence key as you are Message was sent Asset added Youre add request was rejected Not available with sim card Youre licence is already upgraded Don\'t be cute thats your id Admin enabled User did not authorized you to act as it\'s handler, sorry key_pref_allow_boot_notification If device is in missing mode, who ever has this permission will be notified if device is turned on Delete after download Hide files too factory reset after download +981234327687 Device is already added No such user was found in the database Thats all there is with free licence key_pref_allow_disable_silent Disable silent mode and optionally ring an alarm key_pref_allow_disable_silent_encrypted Change default sms app In order to be able to suppress the notification for sms recevied from another devices when the device is lost this app needs to be the default sms app.click on OK and set this app as default Ring stop ringing No files were selected Handlers Assets No sim card was found About Skip The most advanced anti theft application, yet the simplest With 1$ per device With instant delivery of messages tasks will be executed immediately Carmichael has all the features you could possibly need to find your device Each device will only have access to what you allow it and nothing more Start Background image Disable silent even if your device is in do not disturb mode Receive a message whenever the phone is turned on A remote file manager Remotly delete files, this task is part of the file manager Encrypt data ,this task is part of the file manager Download your files to your dropbox account, this task is part of the file manager Mark a set of files and folders with an action (encrypt,download,etc), when your device is lost you can execute all the file related actions by executing this task Get the location of the device Lock your device,you also can specify a custom password(not available for android 7 and above ) If the device is locked because of too many attempts to unlock the app the app will become permanently locked and you can only unlock it by another device with this task Receive a message if the device\'s sim card was changed Receive info about the current state of the device including the battery level left and the tasks that are available to you Capture photos using the front camera,captured pictures will be uploaded to your dropbox account Open a teminal shell to your device Delete all your data and restore default settings Send message Send Info : Sending the message… Show tasks finished successfully Failed Set password At least 6 characters Enter again Passwords don\'t match Task description Set user access : Too many tries,Permanent lock has been activated Remotly Hide your files. this task is part of the file manager Your add request was rejected By disabling admin Carmichael won\'t be able to lock or wipe this device Removed you from being it\'s handler removed you from it\'s assets Device was set as found Do you want to get coffee some time ? Device was removed Cheap Fast Full of features Secure Other devices need this password to activate task remotly key_pref_hide_app_icon_number key_pref_enable_max_attempts Max attempt Remove background image Send sms with Settings has been added to your assets Password can\'t be empty Done This task requires Dropbox to bo installed Install dropbox Failed to set control zone for Control zone has been set for None Read notifications access Because of a bug in this version of android on some devices we need access to read the notifications to be able to enable this task. this permission will also be needed if you want to prevent messages from being displayed in the status bar key_pref_disable_notifications Suppress messages notifications Since android 4.4 and above we can\'t prevent messages from being inserted into inbox but we might be able to suppress messages notification.restart your device afterwards.it might not work with some devices.(it\'s a bug in android) You don\'t need this on this version of android pref_key_is_power_saving_mode Battey saver mode If activated, the app won\'t prevent the device from sleeping till it receive\'s it\'s first command.\nif deactivated the application will always keep the phone awake while it\'s connected to the internet which will drain the battery sooner Last activity : %s Radius : %s Radius can\'t be zero Disable control zone At least 8 charecters Application settings To add a device as an asset you need to send a request to it. this request will be sent using an sms text message but you also need internet connectin so make sure you have both Handlers are devices that control you. Assets are devices that you control If you don\'t know what a task does hold your finger on it to see a description No user info was found Please enter your info Disabling location, please wait There is no report to delete save Can\'t continue without the requested permissions Begin Please first activate this task in settings Accept Decline install Please update google play service.We won\'t be able to continue without it update Change user photo Change background image No saved locations was found Show location history Support Bug report Privacy policy FAQ & Help Carmichael FAQ Ask a question Carmichael documentation Change image Copyright © 2017, The Moment.\n All rights reserved.
